tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE nft_index (
    nft_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    category VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    image_url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);
CREATE TABLE nft_categories (category_id INT PRIMARY KEY, category_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE nft_items (item_id INT PRIMARY KEY, item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, category_id INT REFERENCES nft_categories(category_id));

CREATE TABLE NFTCategories (
    nft_id INT,
    category_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (nft_id, category_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (nft_id) REFERENCES NFTs(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES Categories(id)
);

CREATE TABLE NFTs (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    creator VARCHAR(100),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE NFTCategories (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE NFTOwners (
    nft_id UUID,
    owner_id UUID,
    PRIMARY KEY (nft_id, owner_id)
)

CREATE TABLE NFTHistory (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    nft_id UUID,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id UUID
)

CREATE TABLE NFTTags (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    tag_name VARCHAR(50)
)
